name: Force Sub Bot
description: Force SUb Bot is a Python based Telegram bot to Force Telegram Users to subscribe a channel.

API_HASH.description: Your API HASH Get it from my.telegram.org

API_ID.description: Your API ID Get it from my.telegram.org

WELCOME_MSG.description: welcome message For USERS to display. Can be formatted with {mention}, {title}, {fullname}, {username}, {name}, {last}, {channel}.

WELCOME_NOT_JOINED.description: The welcome message to display if user hasn't joined your channel. Can be formatted with {mention}, {title}, {fullname}, {username}, {name}, {last}, {channel}.

ON_JOIN.description: True/False. To configure if user must be muted directly on joining

ON_NEW_MSG.description: True/False. If the user must be muted on sending a message without being in the channel.
